rows.label: qev015101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Clip clip clop... Do you hear that? The footsteps?
Is that Death creeping up behind you?
Or are they your own steps as you ascend the gallows?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Either way, each step brings you closer to your own
end. The end begins! Good morning. Good morning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0010
rows.name: Play Along

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask who the person is and what they want.

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell the person you're hanging up.

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I am the Blood Lobster—a dead man who crawled
his way free from the deepest, blackest pit of hell.
...But today, I'm also your guardian angel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ah ah ah! Patience, friend. Patience. You wouldn't want
to miss the Blood Lobster's helpful hint, would you?
You might just...DIE FOR IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0005
rows.name:
But first, a game. Do you see that toy in front of you?
Pick it up and throw it as far as you can. Hurry now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0006
rows.name:
And if you don't...BOOOOM! Kyaaaa ha ha ha!
It's true, it's true. Listen to its heart if you don't
believe me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Clip clip clop... Do you hear that? The footsteps?
Is that Death creeping up behind you?
Or are they your own steps as you ascend the gallows?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0030
rows.name: Throw

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0031
rows.name: Take the toy and hurl it as far as you can.

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0040
rows.name: Examine

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0041
rows.name: Pick up the toy and listen for any strange sounds.

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Do you hear it whisper? Click click, ticktock,
ashes to ashes for all of us.
Now if you want to live, THROW IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I am the Blood Lobster, grim reaper of New LA.
You owe your life to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Humans, xenos—none of it matters. This rotten ark and
everyone on it will end in a wall of fire and pain.
No one gets out alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Do you hear those little heartbeats? I've left a hundred
of these adorable little presents all around the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0012
rows.name:
And you're the only one who knows.
But if you tell another soul...BOOOOM![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Uh-oh... I hear Death's footsteps getting closer.
I'd start running if you hope to beat me to the bang![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0014
rows.name:
As long as you're you, [ST:playername ],
the countdown will not stop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now, run! Run and suffer! Dance to the mad tune of
your own inexorable failure! Kyaaaa ha ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0040
rows.name: Ah! I almost forgot to mention something important...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0042
rows.name:
I left some of my feisty little babies in places that can
only be reached with a Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0043
rows.name:
If you don't have one yet, it's time to pull up those
grown-up pants and get clearance from that idiot
commander of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0044
rows.name:
That's all for now. The next thing you hear from me
will be...BOOOOOOOM! Kyaaaaa ha ha ha ha!
Don't keep my little babies waiting. Ticktock ticktock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0016
rows.name:
Well, look at that! A grown [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]out collecting toys.
Just who do you plan to give them to, hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0050
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0051
rows.name: Demand to know the Blood Lobster's identity.

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0060
rows.name: Threaten

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0061
rows.name: Say he will get the toys back...with interest.

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0017
rows.name:
I am Death, the destroyer of worlds. I am an artist.
I am the Blood Lobster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0018
rows.name:
And who are you, hmm? Answer me THAT!
Who are you REALLY?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oooooh, a threat. My my my, I have chills.
Hurry, then! Hurry up and catch me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Find me, and you'll know who I am.
But who are YOU, really? Hmmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Kyaaaaa ha ha ha! The poor little nobody is racing
around this worthless town trying to play hero![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0022
rows.name:
I've prepared a special present for you today,
my little puppet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ooo! Tell me what it is, Daddy! Tell me, tell me!
Well, my dear, it's a faaaabulous MURDER PARTY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0024
rows.name: This is the site where they test new Skells, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Huh? No, they're explaining the new housing
allotments here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Er, the mail I got said they were holding an outdoor
movie screening of Skell Wars 2: The Skellening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0041
rows.name: What's going on here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Happy birthday, [ST:playername ]!
I went ahead and blew out the candles for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Did you like that? Just a little reward from Daddy for 
collecting so many of my little babies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0029
rows.name:
If you don't hurry and find the other 50,
hundreds more oblivious fools will die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Panic! Get angry! Shout, cry, break down for me!
All of this is happening because you...are YOU!
Now run, runner! Staaaaart ruuuuunning![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0031
rows.name:
My dear, dear [ST:playername ]!
You're finally down to the last of my precious babies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Such a busy worker bee. I just want to pull all your
little bits apart and see what makes you tick![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0033
rows.name:
But that will have to wait until you find the last toy.
And I've put that one in a veeery special place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0070
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask where the last toy is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_JNK0080
rows.name: Lose Temper

rows.label: qev015101_SEL0081
rows.name: Demand to know where the Blood Lobster is hiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Ah! Such an obedient little puppet.
You make Daddy so very...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0035
rows.name:
ANGRY! Oh, I am SO going to enjoy killing you in
person! Just a bit longer now. Kyaaa ha ha ha ha!
Are you EXCITED yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0036
rows.name:
That's not how the game is played, honey bunny.
What did I tell you about patience?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0037
rows.name:
But rest assured, I'll kill you in person.
Just a biiiiit longer now. Kya ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0038
rows.name:
I left the last of my little babies with one of New LA's
especially useless citizens...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015101_MSG0039
rows.name:
It's the perfect cure for their annoying little justice fetish.
...Well? Better find them before they go BOOM!
The finale begins! The curtain rises! Author, author![ST:wait ]
